name: STAR SOD
description:
This is a personal project I've been working on by myself for a while. It's a VR Action Shooter that makes you feel like Neo from the matrix.

A mysterious group of rogues calling themselves STAR have kidnapped you. In this VR shooter you will right the wrongs of the "evil" Space Trading Association as you are tasked/forced into suicidal missions.

A short concise adventure and a first glimpse into the STA Universe.

Dodge bullets and use an arsenal of weapons including a two handed assault rifle and a grenade launcher to dispense justice on those your master determines to be evil.
